Vikings invade York again

Grabbing her axe and horned helmet, Meg Shaw goes searching for Vikings, nearly a thousand years after we thought they had left forever

Franz Ferdinand, Franz Ferdinand

Gary Jules, Trading Snakeoil For Wolftickets

Single Honours

Scout Niblett, Fibbers

The Zutons, Leeds Rocket

Catch 22, Fibbers

The Summer Traffic

Expect Delays: All the bears have come out of hibernation too early and Cliff Richard has donned his tennis shorts. Why? Rob Taylor went to Fibbers only to discover those pesky Delays with a bag full of summer pop.

The Roman Baths, Parliament Street

19 Grape Lane

The Wendy House

Opporto, Leeds

Odd Socs Social on Campus

With over eighty societies on campus, York students are spoilt for choice and in the aftermath of the recent refreshers fair it is high time for those odd socs to have their say...

Kebabs

Get lost in this

Cert. 15 Director: Sofia Coppola Starring: Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson Runtime: 101 minutes

Turning Japanese, Tom?

Cert. 15 Director: Edward Zwick Starring: Tom Cruise, Billy Connoly, Tony Goldwyn Runtime: 153 minutes

What you won't see in 2004

So, what will we not see in the forthcoming year? The tiny vanguard of fans waiting for the next instalment of the Star Wars series will be devastated to hear that the film will not be released this year.

What to watch out for in 2004

Read our planner to find out what to expect in the coming months

Actually Not Bad

Director: Richard Curtis, Starring: Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon Cert: 15 Runtime: 134mins

Be Reel Quick...

Director: Joel Coen Starring: George Clooney, Catherine Zeta-Jones Cert: 12A Runtime: 119mins

Matrix Revolutions

Director: Andy Wachowski Starring: Keanu Reeves Cert: 15 Runtime: 119 Mins

Crowe's Nest

Director: Peter Weir Starring: Russell Crowe, Billy Boyd Cert: 12A Runtime: 138mins

The Turn of the Tide Returns

Director: Peter Jackson Starring: Liv Tyler, Elijah Wood, Ian McKellan Cert: 12 Runtime: 206mins

Behind Lord Of The Rings

There is a small glimpse of the film's secrets at the London Science Museum, but is it enough for hardened fans? Where: London Science Museum (South Kensington Tube) When: Now, Until 11th January 2004 Price: PS6.95 (Student) + PS1.00 online booking fee
